body: Can we get a new map rotation for destroy 1 please? no one goes to the other servers so dont suggest to go there. We need new ones on destroy 1 the ones we have are super repetitive
body_tagged: Can we get a new map rotation for destroy 1 please? no one goes to the other servers so dont suggest to go there. We need new ones on destroy 1 the ones we have are super repetitive
title: NEW MAP ROATIONS

replies.body:
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/5671b2f86

You can suggest changes for the rotation there and hopefully a Map Dev will respond to it. Just simply state the map you want to remove and a map you would like to see.
replies.body_tagged:
https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/5671b2f86

You can suggest changes for the rotation there and hopefully a Map Dev will respond to it. Just simply state the map you want to remove and a map you would like to see.

replies.body: We were just discussing it in our Administrator meeting. Expect changes soon.
replies.body_tagged: We were just discussing it in our Administrator meeting. Expect changes soon.

replies.body:
"Map voting where after the match you can vote what map next"
Can easily be abused by constantly voting for 1 map all the time.

"Different daily rotations or something smooth like that"
This could work, it would need a lot of work from the Map Developers though...

replies.body:
Remove Senex 2 and add Senex 3

Remove Rendezvous 3 (please, Rendezvous 3 is being played sooo many times in scrims & tournaments too) and add Rendezvous 2 back

Add both Candyland maps

Add Justice maps (at least 2)

Add Luar (original)

And of course, add Quintus 1.0.0 (No redstone, no iron armor in chests, 5 monuments etc.)

replies.body: The real problem is that the Map Dev team almost never listens to the community (and their suggestions) and that they're way too slowly and inactively working on their projects. We had so many great suggestions: Map rating after map ends, Custom rotations with a chance for each map to get in (Example: Rendezvous 1.0 chance: 50%, Quintus chance: 10%, Ravaged chance: 5%) etc. but they're never implemented, no matter how many +1's they have.
replies.body_tagged: The real problem is that the Map Dev team almost never listens to the community (and their suggestions) and that they're way too slowly and inactively working on their projects. We had so many great suggestions: Map rating after map ends, Custom rotations with a chance for each map to get in (Example: Rendezvous 1.0 chance: 50%, Quintus chance: 10%, Ravaged chance: 5%) etc. but they're never implemented, no matter how many +1's they have.

replies.body:
all the suggestions you posted require developers 

Quintus is already in Mix and will probably stay there.


and mapdevs are busy doing something else (https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/dd2c11776?reply=345974)
¯\_(ツ)_/¯
